# ChainStateIndexer Configuration

## Required Fields

| Config | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| $${\color{red}\texttt{Config.EigenDADirectory}}$$<br>`CHAINSTATE_INDEXER_CONFIG_EIGEN_DA_DIRECTORY`<br><br>type: `string` | EigenDADirectory contract address |
| $${\color{red}\texttt{Config.HTTPPort}}$$<br>`CHAINSTATE_INDEXER_CONFIG_HTTP_PORT`<br><br>type: `string` | Port for the HTTP API server that serves indexed data queries. |
| $${\color{red}\texttt{Config.PersistencePath}}$$<br>`CHAINSTATE_INDEXER_CONFIG_PERSISTENCE_PATH`<br><br>type: `string` | Path to JSON file for persisting indexed state to disk. |
| $${\color{red}\texttt{Secret.EthRpcUrls}}$$<br>`CHAINSTATE_INDEXER_SECRET_ETH_RPC_URLS`<br><br>type: `[]string` | Ethereum RPC endpoint URLs for connecting to the blockchain. |

## Optional Fields

| Config | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| $${\color{red}\texttt{Config.BlockBatchSize}}$$<br>`CHAINSTATE_INDEXER_CONFIG_BLOCK_BATCH_SIZE`<br><br>type: `uint64`<br>default: `1000` | Number of blocks to process in each batch during indexing. |
| $${\color{red}\texttt{Config.LogFormat}}$$<br>`CHAINSTATE_INDEXER_CONFIG_LOG_FORMAT`<br><br>type: `string`<br>default: `"json"` | The format of the log file. Accepted options are 'json' and 'text' |
| $${\color{red}\texttt{Config.LogLevel}}$$<br>`CHAINSTATE_INDEXER_CONFIG_LOG_LEVEL`<br><br>type: `string`<br>default: `"info"` | The lowest log level that will be output. Accepted options are "debug", "info", "warn", "error" |
| $${\color{red}\texttt{Config.PersistInterval}}$$<br>`CHAINSTATE_INDEXER_CONFIG_PERSIST_INTERVAL`<br><br>type: `time.Duration`<br>default: `30s` | Interval for persisting state snapshots to disk. |
| $${\color{red}\texttt{Config.PollInterval}}$$<br>`CHAINSTATE_INDEXER_CONFIG_POLL_INTERVAL`<br><br>type: `time.Duration`<br>default: `12s` | Interval between polling for new blocks on the chain. |
| $${\color{red}\texttt{Config.StartBlockNumber}}$$<br>`CHAINSTATE_INDEXER_CONFIG_START_BLOCK_NUMBER`<br><br>type: `uint64`<br>default: `0` | Starting block number for indexing. If 0, starts from contract deployment block. |
